snippet.title: TRiCK or TREAT story!!  Pumpkin vs Adley Niko & Navey! a spooky School Escape halloween Roblox game
snippet.description:
Can we defeat the Roblox PUMPKiN KiNG?!

JOIN THE FAM - https://www.youtube.com/@GforGaming

HEY EVERYBODY!! We promised we'd be back with a part 2 of our Halloween Roblox special and here we are! Welcome back to another extra scary episode of G for Gaming! Today Adley, Niko, Navey and Dad plus some friends and cousins! First up, we tried out this spooky, trick or treating Roblox story game! It seemed normal at first, we were just going from house to house getting candy and doing the normal Halloween things UNTIL we got to the last house and the EViL PUMPKiN KiNG was inside with a trap for us! To win, we all had to get through a bunch of challenges and obbys so we could save Halloween! At the very end, Niko finally found the golden piece of candy and won the whole game for us! After that we played a school game with a spooky twist! We had to run around the school finding money and things so that we could fight against the bullies and... the spooky mascot! We didn't get too far but we tried out best! We had such a blast playing these scary Roblox games for Halloween!

Happy Halloween!

Thanks for Watching!! BYE! PSSSSSSSHHHHHHHHHHHH


enjoy some A for Adley videos: https://www.youtube.com/c/AforAdleyLe...
have a blast with our A for Adley Shorts: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMHpfyAqrjrhn-mRS2bUL0g
share a best day ever with our family: https://www.youtube.com/user/Shonduras
fun best day ever shorts: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgVE...

watch the latest A for Adley video: the SUPER SCARY STORY!! my Daughter Decides what i Say! Adley Niko & Navey make a new costume movie
https://youtu.be/UuteQznF4fA?feature=shared


this is our channel G for Gaming!! this is a place that i can share all of my favorite gaming moments!!
